about: Founded in 2016 and based in Waltham, Massachusetts, Ultra Footwear Accelerator is dedicated to helping brands bring innovative products to life. We collaborate with a wide network of global suppliers, offering expertise in materials such as leathers, recycled leathers, advanced outsoles, insoles, and more. Our mission is to support brands in creating cutting-edge footwear solutions. For inquiries, please reach out to us through our contact form.

whychooseus.title: Innovative Materials
whychooseus.description: We offer a wide range of materials, including leathers, recycled leathers, advanced outsoles, insoles, and more.

whychooseus.title: Global Network
whychooseus.description: Our network of suppliers spans the globe, allowing us to source the best materials for your project.

whychooseus.title: Expertise
whychooseus.description: Our team has years of experience in the footwear industry, providing you with the knowledge and support you need.
